nodes.text:
Dozu Lam was a small settlement and de facto capital of the planet Tejrivozs. It was established thousands of years before the Battle of Yavin, originally serving as a camp for Riflor refugees. When Riflor natives began to settle down on their own planet, Dozu Lam was forgotten and abandoned.
It eventually became a haven for criminals and pirates.
The Advozse Zom Dubrotin was the chief administrator of Dozu Lam during the waning years of the Old Republic.
